File Manager Module

This class for file operations and system monitoring.

class pyAdmin.file_manager.FileManager[source]

Bases: object

A class to manage files, directories, and system monitoring.

Provides methods to copy, move, compress files, and monitor system resources.

compress_files(files: List[str], zip_name: str) → bool[source]

Create a ZIP archive from a list of files.

Parameters:

  • files (List[str]) – List of file paths to compress.

  • zip_name (str) – Name of the output ZIP archive.

Returns:

True if successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

copy_file(source: str, destination: str) → bool[source]

Copy a file from source to destination.

Parameters:

  • source (str) – Path to the source file.

  • destination (str) – Path to the destination.

Returns:

True if successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

get_system_status() → Dict[source]

Get system resource usage (disk, memory, CPU).

Returns:

System status data or empty dict if psutil is not installed.

Return type:

Dict

move_file(source: str, destination: str) → bool[source]

Move a file from source to destination.

Parameters:

  • source (str) – Path to the source file.

  • destination (str) – Path to the destination.

Returns:

True if successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
